# Recalibrate

> Comprehensive allied health platform for chronic pain, chronic illness, and health management.

## About
Recalibrate is an all-in-one health and pain management platform designed for patients, clinicians, and carers. It combines symptom tracking, education, AI-powered insights, therapeutic tools, and connected care.

## Key Products

### Recalibrate App
- Smart Tracker: 18+ health variables across 8 biological systems
- Analytics Dashboard: Stability Score, trend analysis, pattern detection
- Pain Science Academy: 100+ evidence-based lessons
- Therapeutic Tools: Journaling, goal tracking, guided exercises, CBT, mindfulness
- Recalibrate AI: Chat about health data, get personalized insights
- Care Team: Connect patients with clinicians and family

### Recalibrate Protocol
- 8-system clinical framework for chronic pain
- 12-month protocol maps
- 8-day email course
- Quick reference guides
- Research directory with 250+ peer-reviewed studies
- URL: https://recalibratepain.app/protocol
